_header: Wherefore prennes en gree / There is none other remedy
_description: A verse aphorism in a letter from John Paston II to John Paston III, 8 November 1472 — one couplet

BLAdd43491.Transcription:
wherffor prennes en gree
þer is noon othere remedee
BLAdd43491.Editions:
Davis,  Norman,
                        ed.  
             The Paston Letters and Papers of the Fifteenth Century.
         2 vols. Oxford: Clarendon, 1971, 1976: 1.452.
